review.title: “Certa Q Marketing provides a platform for its team members to excel and maximize their efforts.”
review.pros: Pros – -Awesome team environment-Great coaches and mentors-Good energy and motivation within staff-Very Productive work culture-Opportunity to advance your career if desired
review.cons: Cons – -Nothing to think of. Mainly positive
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
